title: looking for a team to join
body:
i can play any position/lane, but i main adc. i am an older mature guy who works well in teams. i have had consistent bad luck  with placings due to i solo que not duo. but am keen and looking for a team to play with and kick some butt... 
thanks, Jonezy89

replies.body: Hey man. I have a ranked team I am making. Seems you could fit in nicely :D I'll find you in lol and message you anyway but thanks for posting on the boards :D
